1101100110110011 0110110000101000 1 -> sum: 0100010111011100, cout: 1
1100011001100111 0001000011010111 1 -> sum: 1101011100111111, cout: 0
1000110001101100 1000000010100110 1 -> sum: 0000110100010011, cout: 1
1111011000111101 0101000110011111 1 -> sum: 0100011111011101, cout: 1
1100111000011010 0000111000011001 1 -> sum: 1101110000110100, cout: 0
0111001100010001 0010010100110100 0 -> sum: 1001100001000101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

1111111111111111 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
